message: Let's split it 4:1, I'm willing to be generous!
You were too generous, now it's my turn to be generous too!
You think that's generous? I'll think of something better!
Meet me in the middle, let's call it a day!
You're getting closer, but I still want more!
You're getting less than you would've gotten in round 1, I'm not budging!
Time to make a move, Bob, I'm not going to let you get the better deal!
You're getting desperate, I can smell it! I'm not going to let you have it all!
You think you're smelling desperation, but I'm just getting started!
It's now or never, Bob, take it or leave it!
You're getting greedy, Alice. I'll take what I can get now.
You're being cheap, Bob. I'm not going to let you get away with it that easily!
This is my last offer, Bob. Take it or we'll both lose!
Fine, be that way. I'll take the crumbs.
Fine, you got your way. Congratulations, I guess.
